about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Discover our heart, mission, and vision

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We have a clear mission: "To lead every captive person to live the full rescue in Christ Jesus through the knowledge of God and His Word". We believe that every person has the potential to experience God's transformative power and live in the fullness of His purpose.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A family church that makes disciples who reflect and manifest God's Glory, destroying the works of evil and reaching their neighbours. We envision a community where every member grows in faith, serves with passion, and impacts their world for Christ.

pillars.title: Our Five Pillars
pillars.subtitle: The foundation stones that guide everything we do as a church family

family.title: Relationship
family.description: We are more than a congregation; we are a family. Every person who walks through our doors is welcomed with open arms and genuine love, creating an environment where authentic relationships flourish.

discipleship.title: Discipleship
discipleship.description: We are committed to helping every believer grow in their relationship with Christ through intentional mentoring, Bible study, and practical application of God's Word in daily life.

worship.title: Worship
worship.description: Our worship is passionate, authentic, and Spirit-led. We believe that true worship transforms hearts and creates an atmosphere where God's presence is tangibly felt and experienced.

ministry.title: Ministry
ministry.description: Every member is equipped and empowered to serve according to their God-given gifts and calling. We believe that ministry is not limited to the pulpit but extends to every area of life and service.

evangelism.title: Evangelism
evangelism.description: We are passionate about sharing the Gospel and reaching the lost. Through both organized outreach and personal witness, we strive to bring the hope of Christ to our community and beyond.

leadership.title: Our Leadership
leadership.subtitle: Passionate leaders committed to serving God and His people

member1.name: Pastor Alexandre Izumi
member1.description: Leading with passion and dedication to see lives transformed by the power of God.

member3.description: Passionate about raising up the next generation for God's kingdom purposes.

member4.name: Apostle Daniela Fraga
member4.description: Devoted to a life of worship and equipping others to encounter God through wholehearted praise and teaching
